name: Tic-Tac-Toe (GB Jam 8) (Game Boy ROM)
description:
I was too busy to participate in GB Jam again this year, but I had a bit of free time on Sunday so threw together a tic-tac-toe game really quickly. I originally added music better graphics and some flashy graphics & graphical effects, but it all felt a bit ugly so I simplified it. It's just tic-tac-toe after all... It doesn't even have a CPU opponent--just pass-and-play local multiplayer with a friend. Sorry I wasn't able to submit something cool! Maybe next year!

This is a Game Boy (DMG) ROM that can be played in a GB emulator or on a real Game Boy. I'll try to add comments and re-release the source to help people who are curious about GB programming. If I have time, I might add some stuff like link cable support, Super Game Boy functionality, etc.--we'll see...

Controls: Only the directional pad and A button are used. It should be self-explanatory.
